dcterms:creator: Emily Dinan
Stephen Roller
Kurt Shuster
Angela Fan
Michael Auli
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: The Wizard of Wikipedia dataset contains 18,430 dialogues for training, 1,948 dialogues for validation, and 1,933 dialogues for testing. It includes ground-truth labels of knowledge selection and clear grounding between the pairs of selected knowledge and response.
dcterms:title: Wizard of Wikipedia

dcterms:creator: Nikita Moghe
Siddhartha Arora
Suman Banerjee
Mitesh M Khapra
dcterms:description: The Holl-E dataset contains 7,228 dialogues for training, 930 dialogues for validation, and 913 dialogues for testing. It includes a single document per dialogue, with an average of 58 sentences on average.
dcterms:title: Holl-E
